name: Decentralized Infrastructure for a Utopian Future
description:
Today, the infrastructure powering the web of value is centralized and fragile -- not the utopian decentralized future originally envisioned. For blockchain technology to take on the world's financial needs, we must distribute infrastructure so that anyone can participate and everyone can benefit. 
Join us for a discusison on the effort to truly decentralize the critical infrastructure we all rely upon.
